Package cs3500.easyanimator.view

Class ViewImplSVG

java.lang.Object
cs3500.easyanimator.view.ViewImplSVG
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView
public class ViewImplSVG
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView
SVG View for the animation model. This outputs a file that can be read by an svg reader to create full animations.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewImplSVG

      public ViewImplSVG​(java.lang.Appendable output, int secondsPerTick, IReadOnlyModel readOnlyModel)
      A constructor that requires an appendable type to output the textual data, a speed for the tick, and a read-only model.
      Parameters:
      output - the output type for the text
      secondsPerTick - the tick speed in which the animation plays
      readOnlyModel - the read-only model of type IReadOnlyModel

  • Method Details

    • generateView

      private void generateView() throws java.io.IOException
      Method to generate the SCG text and append it to the given appendable.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the appendable cannot be written to

    • getSVGText

      private java.lang.String getSVGText​(IAnimationModel model)
      Method to get the svg type text. Converts our animation model read-only to animation model.
      Parameters:
      model - the read-only animation model that is used for outputting text.

    • svgEllipseCommands

      private java.lang.String svgEllipseCommands​(IShape shape, java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet> actions)
      The svg commands for an ellipse. There is a separate method because there are different attributed for an ellipse than a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      shape - the shape to have commands.
      actions - the commands that will be implemented on the shape in the textual view.
      Returns:
      a String of action commands for the svg view.

    • svgRectangleCommands

      private java.lang.String svgRectangleCommands​(IShape shape, java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet> actions)
      The svg commands for an rectangle. There is a separate method because there are different attributed for an ellipse than a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      shape - the shape to have commands.
      actions - the commands that will be implemented on the shape in the textual view.
      Returns:
      a String of animate commands for the svg view.

      public void showView()
      Description copied from interface: IView
      Creates the view's visuals that is intended to be made as per the implementation and type of view.

    • addFeatureListeners

      public void addFeatureListeners​(IControllerFeatures features)
      Description copied from interface: IView
      Passes the features of the controller of type IControllerFeatures to the view. Allows the view to retrieve these features from the controller to execute the proper reaction.
      Specified by:
      addFeatureListeners in interface IView
      Parameters:
      features - the possible actions that the controller supports, of type IControllerFeatures
